channel.title: Looking for users and some feedback on my fitness platform
channel.description: We are a platform that brings together LIVE workout and wellness classes with 2-way video so members can interact with their online class in real time. A robust & diverse set of 40+ expert-led classes taught each week all for. Classes are taught via 2-way video stream create the community feel. The entire class can interact with the expert instructors and each other in real time fostering meaningful relationships with community members. The first platform that combines LIVE workout and wellness classes, together. Diverse programming helps to eliminate fickle decision making, generate content sacristy and discovery, and implement regiment.

item.title: Looking for users and some feedback on my fitness platform
item.dc:creator: PitterPattr
